lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In order to stimulate domestic demand and boost the economy, tax reforms aimed at bringing down the cost of land and reforming the nation's housing stock are needed, along with steps to bring down the high cost of commodities, he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He also said the yen's large and rapid rise is depressing the outlook for the Japanese economy, noting that in addition to hurting exporters it is also damaging domestic market manufacturers through cheap imports.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He rejected recent calls from some government quarters for wage increases this year as a means of raising private consumption and thus boosting domestic demand.
